attributes.title: terrible!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app expecting to see the kings of kpop SHINee but instead i saw trump! i was very disappointed because i was so excited to see my favs finally make their own app but it turns out it was a donald trump app :/ i will be giving this a 1 star because they title is VERY misleading! many shawols will get confused by this awful app!! SHAME ON YOU FOR MISLEADING PEOPLE!!

attributes.title: All apps matter
attributes.review: I do not see why this app has to get all the attention. There are so many apps that deserve to be used and not just this one! I find it very disrespectful that the other apps have worked very hard and long to get where they are at that they are not being used.

attributes.title: that’s🧚‍♀️a🧚‍♀️NO🧚‍♀️cheeto man
attributes.review: this Orange head 🍊is a big (poopy weenie head) I don’t like this app because my eyes have been burned by the picture I have seen of the cheeto man 🧚‍♀️while opening this app I am disappointed I feel disgusted, and I feel like we all need a little more respect from this man👨‍🦲i am so sorry for whoever else has felt what i am feeling rn 😔 i want to cry btw BLM ✊🏿, MLM✊🏽, GLM 🌈,WM 👩, ILM, ACAB 💋

attributes.title: DONt dOwnloAd
attributes.review: i downloaded this app as a proud trumpet and as soon as i opened it the “call the president feature” popped up, when i clicked on it trump’s only fans account popped up and he was FINGERPAINTING USING HIS DIARRHEA. i was absolutely mortified watching this with my dying grandmother on her deathbed. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! i am now a proud democrat who has to go to therapy for PTSD from watching that video each day.

attributes.title: Oh To See Without My Eyes —👄—
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app but for some reason there seems to be a barrier between us. 😩 And also, when I recommended this to friends and family they told me how I can be such a misogynistic, family breaker, anti-human piece of trash😿 
While I love my Tangerine 🍊 Bleach toddler 💕, this app could use some work. Anyways, toodles 🤪🧚‍♀️  🧚‍♂️ 💞💓💗💘💝💖❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤🤍🤎

attributes.title: a disgrace to this world
attributes.review: well the app is haunted. it says “make america great again” but all it does is haunt my dreams and sells my feet pics on the indian black market👁👄👁 all of this is true but also every 5 mins it lets out a “CHEESE PUFF SCENT” and im extremely allergic🤧 in conclusion this app is disgusting, disgraceful and dumb af just like the president, anyone that says otherwise, i will eat your dog. ANYONE BUT TRUMP 2020!🇺🇸🤩💕💘🦋❕🥰⭐️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Never before in my life have I believed in ghosts. I downloaded after I heard the tragic new... #Riptrump and as soon as I downloaded an Orange skinned blonde headed man comes zooming through my wall! THROUGH IT! He came straight at me and asked me where my 13 year old daughter was. Why did that happen?? I just wanted to honor our presidents memory and this is what I got! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Terrible app Bunker boy!
attributes.review: I cannot believe anyone would make such a terrible app, it makes my phone freeze and glitches whenever I open it, I was really rooting for you, bunker boy, you should have enough money to fix your trash app. And not to mention the derogative things in it, ugh just absolutely disgusting. 🧚✨🌈You shriveled evil orange ✨🌈🧚

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!
attributes.review: this app is so terrible. it made my phone glitch so much, i was scared i was going to have to get a new one! i constantly get notifications and texts from this app, it’s overwhelming and i can’t have my phone beeping at me every minute of every day! if i could give this app zero stars i would. it is absolutely HORRIBLE. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: This app gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: I was extremely excited to download this app and help our president in any way possible but as soon as I downloaded the app my phone screen was flooded with pictures of Donald trump in bathing suits and a giant brick wall behind him I urge anyone thinking of downloading this not to or your phone will suffer the consequences.
